V'esA neuron.Definition: Sensory PNS neuron of embryonic / larval abdominal segments 1-7, the pro-, meta- or mesothoracic segments (Dambly-Chaudiere and Ghysen, 1986). In the abdominal segments it is located dorsal to vesC, and ventral to v'esB. In the thoracic segments 2 and 3 it is located ventral to the cluster of vesA-E neurons, but is located anterior to it in thoracic segment T1.
